title: Headline Series
additional-note: The renewal record for #60 in CCE is the first one to specifically mention Headline Series.  However, since many of the issues in this series were monographs, the monograph title for an issue should also be checked (as a book) to see if it was renewed.  We have not systematically checked those titles past number 3.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Lloyd Frank for copyright research on this title.
